articles.title: Access to affordable care and recognizing psoriasis under National Health Schemes in India - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: The prevalence rate of psoriasis is around 2 – 4 % in the western world, whereas in India it is around 1 -2 %. It is also alarming to note that the prevalence of the disease is increasing in developing countries also.
articles.content: by Dr. Ramesh Bhat MPsoriasis is one among the common skin diseases prevalent all over the world. It is a chronic immune mediated skin disease with significant physical and psychological impact. The … [+3515 chars]
